remarks: The full vector space ` U ` constructed from a Hilbert lattice ` K ` (given a fiducial hyperplane ` W ` ) is a left module.  (Contributed by NM, 23-May-2015.)
statement:
dvhlvec.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dvhlvec.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvhlvec.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
dvhlvec $p |- ( ph -> U e. LVec ) $.
